attributes.additional_details:
BBC  
Offers no real quality broadcasting
Poor news and politically biased 
Not presenting UK public any more
Over paid  staff.

We the UK people feel there is no value in  the service provided.

Higher quality TV is provided free from othere  Free view channels and we have a choice of better quality programming non biased  news along with othere pay Tv and online streaming  services , gives us the UK Vast choice.

We should not have to also made to pay for a service that is not for the people of this country
attributes.background: End  this additional  burden on the Uk population
